exception: throw new IllegalStateException("Can't change activity type once set: " + this + " activityType=" + activityTypeToString(activityType));
z3Program:
from z3 import *
from z3_all_models import *

activityType0 = Int('activityType0')
mActivityType0 = Int('mActivityType0')
ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED0 = Int('ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED0')

constraints = [
  ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED0 == 0,
  And(Not(mActivityType0 == activityType0), And(And(isSystem(), mActivityType0 != ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED0), activityType0 != ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED0))
]

solver = Solver()
for constraint in constraints:
  solver.add(constraint)

models = list(all_smt(solver))
for model in models: print(model)
symPyProgram:
from sympy import Symbol
from sympy import simplify
from sympy.core.relational import Eq, Ne, StrictGreaterThan, StrictLessThan, LessThan, GreaterThan
from sympy.printing import ccode

activityType = Symbol('activityType', integer=True)
mActivityType = Symbol('mActivityType', integer=True)
_isSystem = Symbol('_isSystem')
path_conjunction = ((~((Eq(mActivityType, activityType)))) & ((_isSystem & (Ne(mActivityType, 0))) & (Ne(activityType, 0))))
print(ccode(simplify(path_conjunction)))
